title: André Villas-Boas
summary: Luís André de Pina Cabral e Villas-Boas (Portuguese pronunciation: [luˈiz‿ɐ̃ˈdɾɛ ðɨ ˈpinɐ kɐˈβɾaɫ i ˈvilɐʒ ˈboɐʃ]; born 17 October 1977) is a Portuguese football manager, who most recently was the manager of Ligue 1 club Marseille. He is one of a growing number of top-level managers who have never played football professionally and one of the few managers to have never played beyond youth football.[3]
